mapper.sql: id, bs_user_id, name_cn, passwd, phone, status, level, origin, create_date, company, audit_status, code, name_en, pay_passwd, pay_type, currency, salesman_id, user_name, address
mapper.select:
select t.id,t.code,t.company,t.name_cn,t.name_en,t.contact_number,t.phone,t.user_name,t.passwd,t.audit_status,t.audit_user_id,t.audit_time,t.status,t.salesman_id,t.operation_team_id,t.currency,t.address,t.level,t.origin,t.create_date,t.pay_type,t.pay_passwd,t.clearing_way,t.clearing_date,t.lock_date,t.real_date,t.business_license_url,t.remark,t.new_wisdom_token FROM customer t where 1=1
and t.company LIKE concat('%',#{form.company},'%')
and t.user_name like concat('%',#{form.userName},'%')
and t.phone like concat('%',#{form.phone},'%')
AND ( t.`name_cn` LIKE concat('%',#{form.keyword},'%') OR t.`company` LIKE concat('%',#{form.keyword},'%') )
and t.audit_status = #{form.auditStatus}

select t.id,t.code,t.company,t.name_cn,t.name_en,t.contact_number,t.phone,t.user_name,t.passwd,t.audit_status,t.audit_user_id,t.audit_time,t.status,t.salesman_id,t.operation_team_id,t.currency,t.address,t.level,t.origin,t.create_date,t.pay_type,t.pay_passwd,t.clearing_way,t.clearing_date,t.lock_date,t.real_date,t.business_license_url,t.remark,t.new_wisdom_token FROM customer t join ( select DISTINCT t1.id,substring_index( substring_index(t1.operation_team_id,',',t2.id + 1), ',' ,-1 ) as operation_team_id from (select id,operation_team_id from customer ) t1 join help_index t2 on t2.id < (length(t1.operation_team_id) - length(REPLACE(t1.operation_team_id,',','')) + 1 ) ) t1 on t1.id = t.id join operation_team_member t2 on t2.operation_team_id = t1.operation_team_id where 1=1 and t2.member_user_id = #{form.memberUserId}
and t.company LIKE concat('%',#{form.company},'%')
and t.user_name like concat('%',#{form.userName},'%')
and t.phone like concat('%',#{form.phone},'%')
AND ( t.`name_cn` LIKE concat('%',#{form.keyword},'%') OR t.`company` LIKE concat('%',#{form.keyword},'%') )
and t.audit_status = #{form.auditStatus}
group by t.id

select t.id,t.code,t.company,t.name_cn,t.name_en,t.contact_number,t.phone,t.user_name,t.passwd,t.audit_status,t.audit_user_id,t.audit_time,t.status,t.salesman_id,t.operation_team_id,t.currency,t.address,t.level,t.origin,t.create_date,t.pay_type,t.pay_passwd,t.clearing_way,t.clearing_date,t.lock_date,t.real_date,t.business_license_url,t.remark from customer t where 1=1 and (t.phone=#{form.loginname} OR t.user_name=#{form.loginname})

select t.id, t.code, t.company, t.name_cn, t.name_en, t.contact_number, t.phone, t.user_name, t.passwd, t.audit_status, t.audit_user_id, t.audit_time, t.status, t.salesman_id, t.operation_team_id, t.currency, t.address, t.level, t.origin, t.create_date, t.pay_type, t.pay_passwd, t.clearing_way, t.clearing_date, t.lock_date, t.real_date, t.business_license_url, t.remark, t.new_wisdom_token, CONCAT(t.user_name,'(',t.company,')') as text from customer t where 1=1 and t.audit_status = 1

select t.id, t.code, t.company, t.name_cn, t.name_en, t.contact_number, t.phone, t.user_name, t.passwd, t.audit_status, t.audit_user_id, t.audit_time, t.status, t.salesman_id, t.operation_team_id, t.currency, t.address, t.level, t.origin, t.create_date, t.pay_type, t.pay_passwd, t.clearing_way, t.clearing_date, t.lock_date, t.real_date, t.business_license_url, t.remark, t.new_wisdom_token, CONCAT(t.user_name,'(',t.company,')') as text from customer t where t.id = #{customerId}
